example: For n = 15; n-1 = 14, cototient(15) = 15-phi(15) = 7, a(15) = gcd(14,7) = 7; For most n-s, among others for primes a(n) = 1.
maple: with(numtheory); A058663:=n->igcd(n-1, n-phi(n)); seq(A058663(n), n=1..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 01 2014
mathematica: Table[GCD[n - 1, n - EulerPhi[n]], {n, 100}] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 01 2014 *)
author: _Labos Elemer_, Dec 28 2000
